text: Aanei la nia waahale abaaba dangada ala ne hilihili ang gi digau Israel huogodoo mo digau mai i daha ala e noho madalia digaula. Maa tangada guu tiba gu daaligi dana dangada gaa made, le e mee di gida dono gowaa e bala ai i tei nia guongo aanei i tangada dela e hiihai e tala di hui. Digaula e deemee di daaligi gii mmade gaa dae loo gi di gabunga la gaa hai.20.9 Numbers 35.9-34; Deuteronomy 4.41-43; 19.1-13
